front.title: A YANG Module for Network Address Translation (NAT) and Network Prefix Translation (NPT)

abstract.t: This document defines a YANG module for the Network Address Translation (NAT) function. Network Address Translation from IPv4 to IPv4 (NAT44), Network Address and Protocol Translation from IPv6 Clients to IPv4 Servers (NAT64), Customer-side transLATor (CLAT), Stateless IP/ICMP Translation (SIIT), Explicit Address Mappings for Stateless IP/ICMP Translation (SIIT EAM), IPv6 Network Prefix Translation (NPTv6), and Destination NAT are covered in this document. Editorial Note (To be removed by RFC Editor) Please update these statements within the document with the RFC number to be assigned to this document: "This version of this YANG module is part of RFC XXXX;" "RFC XXXX: A YANG Module for Network Address Translation (NAT) and Network Prefix Translation (NPT)" "reference: RFC XXXX" Please update the "revision" date of the YANG module.
